title: Things to Do in San Francisco – February 2017
seo_title: Things to Do in San Francisco – February 2017
meta_description: There’s never a lack of things to do in the City by the Bay. Although the city can get run over with festivals, there are a few that even us locals like to check out. JSYK, these are the events on our radar in February 2017
short_description: There’s never a lack of things to do in the City by the Bay. Although the city can get run over with festivals, there are a few that even us locals like to check out. JSYK, these are the events on our radar in February 2017
long_description:
There’s never a lack of things to do in the City by the Bay. Although the city can get run over with festivals, there are a few that even us locals like to check out. JSYK, these are the events on our radar in February 2017

SF Indie Fest
February 2-16, 2017

Don’t mind our humblebrag, the San Francisco Independent Film Festival has been projecting some of the most diverse, original, and thought-provoking films in the country for the past 19 years. Yet we don’t know what we’re looking forward to more: the films or the parties. Here’s the lineup.

Sting @ The Masonic
February 5

The man needs little introduction. Frankly, we’re still buzzing off The Police reunion tour, but we won’t miss an opportunity to see Sting when he’s just down the street at The Masonic.

The 10th Annual Crunchies Awards @ the War Memorial Opera House
February 6

The de facto awards show of the tech world, the Crunchies celebrate the year’s best in startups and internet innovations. And unlike something like the Oscars, the Crunchies are actually accessible to the public. Did we mention Chelsea Peretti is hosting? You can get tickets here.

“I Left My Until February 28

Go for the staycation this February and earn some brownie points with your SO. We’re offering a 2-day Valentine’s Day package with Napa wine, chocolates, and all the romantic details in the heart of Nob Hill. Consult the package here.

RSA Conference @ the Moscone Center
February 13-17

“Where the world talks cybersecurity” is the tagline for the conference, and that’s no understatement. The annual RSA Conference draws the world’s top authorities on cybersecurity for this 5-day summit. While the conference boasts 45,000+ attendees each year, RSA also packs the information to match. For more information, consult the official website here.
